name: Two Worlds shoot each other (in the face)
name_original: Two Worlds shoot each other (in the face)
description:
Franken GameJam 2022 #JamFranken
Team #DarfEsNochEinBisschenChaosSein

Game Theme: Two Worlds
The Planet EvilCereal has been harassing planets galaxy-wide for their water ressources. When funds dwindle and the monetary aid ran dry after the Galactic Republic shut down the PlanetaryDevSupportFunding for an unknown time, the planet InDieDev sees no other way but to take defensive measures... but EvilCereal had just been waiting for the excuse. Weapons hot!

Like in Worms the players operate the planetary weapons to silence the opponent. Aim, power up and fire! Lethal democracy!

Want to have a look at our "plan"? No liability for damages of any kind.
 https://miro.com/app/board/uXjVPGtEzAM=/?share_link_id=496975476365

Planets and Asteroids made with https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
